extension_desc.message: Automatically finds and applies available coupons and cashback while you shop, helping you save time and money.

setting_modal_history_description.message: Maximum browsing history count (Minimum: {1}, Maximum: {2}, changes are saved automatically):

setting_modal_history_max_placeholder.message: Please enter a value as required: e.g., 30

setting_modal_clear_description.message: Clear cache, including browsing history, etc. Note: Once cleared, it cannot be recovered.

setting_modal_clear_confirm.message: Do you want to clear all browsing history? Once cleared, it cannot be recovered.

auto_detect_modal_secondary_description.message: Automatically tries codes to save you money.

auto_detect_alert_error.message: Whilesave reminders you, it's already the best deal.

auto_detect_alert_success.message: Congratulations from Whilesave, The code has been applied automatically!
